shinyspring 0.0.1
  • Reference

Reference

All functions

app_master

R6 master class (Controller) for your shiny application.

create_module()

Create a baseline Module for your shinyapp

create_new_project()

CLI option to create a new Shiny Spring Project based on predefined templates in shinyspring The New Project wizard in RStudio also call this method

create_shinyapp()

Creates the app.R using the templates defined in inst/cheetah/*

dummy_mod_onLoad()

onLoad for Dummy Mod

dummy_mod_server()

Server Function for dummy mod

dummy_mod_ui()

UI Function for dummy mod

load_built_ts_as_tibble()

load a builtin datasource as tibble

load_row()

Loads a Row based on file type

load_tar_as_tibble()

load a target and put it into a tibble. Note : we clear up the tar_load value before reutrnignt he dataframe to free up the memory

menu_mod_check()

Check menus

minimum_checks()

Minimum chekcsc

mod_registry

R6 class for Modules Management for the shinyspring app

new_dqmaster_row()

creates new dq_master row

new_row()

creates the standardized row for app_master mdata

parse_preloads_in_config()

Parse preload files named in params (config).

run_checks()

Run Config File Check

test_config_file()

Checks if the config file is good to go Note : this runs a bunch of testthat tests

ymlon_to_params()

used to get sub params for a given mod_name
